content.hook_text: What if I told you that everything in the universe follows just four simple rules?

voiceover.text: What if I told you that everything in the universe follows just four simple rules?

content.title: The Laws of Thermodynamics
content.subtitle: The rules that govern energy in our universe

voiceover.text: These are the laws of thermodynamics. The rules that govern energy in our universe.

content.title: Zeroth Law
content.body_text: If two systems are in thermal equilibrium with a third system, they are in equilibrium with each other. This is the foundation of temperature measurement.

voiceover.text: The zeroth law. If two systems are in thermal equilibrium with a third system, they are in equilibrium with each other. This is how we measure temperature.

content.title: First Law
content.body_text: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed from one form to another. The total energy of an isolated system remains constant.

voiceover.text: The first law. Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed. The total energy of an isolated system always remains constant.

content.title: Second Law
content.body_text: Entropy of an isolated system always increases over time. Heat flows naturally from hot to cold, never the reverse without work.

voiceover.text: The second law. Entropy always increases. Heat flows from hot to cold, never the reverse without external work. This is why time moves forward.

content.title: Third Law
content.body_text: As temperature approaches absolute zero, entropy approaches a minimum value. You can never reach absolute zero.

voiceover.text: The third law. As temperature approaches absolute zero, entropy approaches a minimum. But you can never actually reach absolute zero.

content.title: Now You Know
content.body_text: These four laws explain everything from why ice melts to why stars shine. Follow for more science!

voiceover.text: These four laws explain everything from why ice melts to why stars shine. Follow for more science!
